General.Name: Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts (Holding) Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of automobile engine intake and exhaust valve series products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers passenger car gasoline engine, marine diesel engine, engine block diesel, and sports car and racing engine valves. It also exports its products the United States, Italy, the United Kingdom, Japan, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and other countries and regions. Huaiji Dengyun Auto-parts (Holding) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Huaiji, the People's Republic of China.

2.Name: Mr. Yu Shu Wang
2.Title: Chief Engineer, Deputy Gen. Mang. and Director of Technology Devel. Center
